Text: It's clean but most of the flashes are gay porn (not lesbian) with two that are straight.
@Drofsned thanks for saving me some time

Well, that is to be expected, it is called YIFF porn, not YURI porn.
Yiff = Guy + Guy
Yuri = Girl + Girl
Furry = Human/Animal Hybrid, usually.
@Blue64: You're kidding, right? Yaoi is Japanese gay porn, and Yuri is female lesbian porn. Yiff is the term used by furries, no matter the sexual preference.
